TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HtmlTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 将标记字符和文本写入 ASP.NET 服务器控件输出流。

span.span: Writes markup characters and text to an ASP.NET server control output stream.

summary.span: 此类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在向客户端呈现标记时使用的格式化功能。

span.span: This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering markup to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于桌面浏览器上呈现 HTML 4.0。The class is used to render HTML 4.0 to desktop browsers. 中的所有标记写入程序也都是类的基类命名空间，其中包括， ，和类。The is also the base class for all markup writers in the namespace, including the , , and classes. 这些类用于编写元素、 属性和不同类型的标记的样式和布局信息。These classes are used to write the elements, attributes, and style and layout information for different types of markup. 此外，这些类使用与每个标记语言相关联的页面和控件适配器类。In addition, these classes are used by the page and control adapter classes that are associated with each markup language. 在大多数情况下，ASP.NET 会自动为请求的设备使用合适的编写器。In most circumstances, ASP.NET automatically uses the appropriate writer for the requesting device. 但是，如果创建自定义文本编写器，或者你想要指定特定的编写器来呈现特定设备的页面，您必须将写入器映射到中的页`controlAdapters`应用程序.browser 文件部分。However, if you create a custom text writer or if you want to specify a particular writer to render a page for a specific device, you must map the writer to the page in the `controlAdapters` section of the application .browser file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的自定义控件派生自类。The following code example shows how to override the method of a custom control that is derived from the class. 该代码示例说明如何使用各种方法、 属性和字段。The code example illustrates how to use various methods, properties, and fields. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的重载方法，如果该属性不是其中一个值，或如果直到运行时才知道该属性。Use the overload of the method if the attribute is not one of the values, or if the attribute is not known until run time. 例如，任何给定的标记元素的类维护该元素的属性列表。For an instance of any given markup element, the class maintains a list of attributes for that element. 当调用方法时，添加的任何属性方法呈现为元素的开始标记。When the method is called, any attributes added by the method are rendered to the opening tag of the element. 然后从中清除的属性列表对象。The list of attributes is then cleared from the object. 呈现的标记元素的编码模式是按如下所示：The coding pattern for rendering markup elements is as follows: - 使用方法将任何属性添加到元素。Use the method to add any attributes to the element. - 使用 方法。Use the method. - 根据需要使用其他方法来呈现元素的开始和结束标记之间的内容。Use other methods as needed to render the content found between the element's opening and closing tags. - 使用 方法。Use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法之前调用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method before calling the method. 该代码调用的两个不同的重载和两个不同的重载调用之前方法以呈现``元素写入输出流。The code calls two different overloads of and two different overloads of before it calls the method to render a `` element to the output stream. 方法用于定义命名的自定义属性`CustomAttribute`和名为的自定义值`CustomAttributeValue`为``此代码将呈现的元素。The method is used to define the custom attribute named `CustomAttribute` and the custom value named `CustomAttributeValue` for the `` element that this code renders. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的重载方法，如果该属性不是其中一个值，或者直到运行的时和编码才知道该属性是否需要。Use the overload of the method if the attribute is not one of the values, or if the attribute is not known until run time and encoding is needed. 例如，任何给定的标记元素的类维护该元素的属性列表。For an instance of any given markup element, the class maintains a list of attributes for that element. 当调用方法时，添加的任何属性方法呈现为元素的开始标记。When the method is called, any attributes added by the method are rendered to the opening tag of the element. 然后从中清除的属性列表对象。The list of attributes is then cleared from the object. 使用方法替换`fEncode`设置为`true`，如果此属性可能是可以包含引号 （"）、 小于号 (<) 或 and 符 (&)。Use the method with `fEncode` set to `true`, if the attribute can possibly contain a quotation mark ("), a less than sign (<), or an ampersand (&). 方法调用将对要满足的要求请求设备的属性进行编码。The method call will encode the attribute to meet the requirements of the requesting device. 可以设置`fEncode`到`false`，如果您知道，将生成无这些字符，或者如果您知道该属性已编码。You can set `fEncode` to `false`, if you know that none of these characters will be generated, or if you know that the attribute is already encoded. 如果属性类型是`Style`，则这不会进行编码即使`fEndode`是`true`。If the attribute type is `Style`, the value won’t be encoded even if `fEndode` is `true`. 请确保样式值符合 CSS，并且不包含恶意代码。Ensure that the style value is CSS-compliant and doesn’t contain malicious code. 呈现的标记元素的编码模式是按如下所示：The coding pattern for rendering markup elements is as follows: - 使用方法将任何属性添加到元素。Use the method to add any attributes to the element. - 使用 方法。Use the method. - 根据需要使用其他方法来呈现元素的开始和结束标记之间的内容。Use other methods as needed to render the content found between the element's opening and closing tags. - 使用 方法。Use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的重载方法来确保名为的自定义属性`myattribute`，并且其值不编码为``元素。The following code example shows how to use the overload of the method to ensure that a custom attribute, named `myattribute`, and its value are not encoded for an `` element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法写入标记属性和它们的值没有编码的。Use the method to write markup attributes and their values with no encoding. 方法写入特性值括在双引号 （"）。The method writes the attribute value enclosed in double quotation marks ("). 如果`value`是`null`，则方法写入仅属性名称。If `value` is `null`, the method writes only the attribute name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何呈现``元素中的哪两种重载方法时调用。The following code example demonstrates rendering an `` element in which both overloads of the method are called. 代码示例使用以下过程：The code example uses the following process: - 调用方法，它将呈现的元素的开始字符。Calls the method, which renders the opening characters of the element. - 调用重载以将`alt`属性和其值为``元素。Calls the overload, which writes an `alt` attribute and its value to the `` element. - 调用重载来呈现自定义`myattribute`属性，值为`No "encoding" required`，然后设置`fEncode`到`false`。Calls the overload to render a custom `myattribute` attribute, with a value of `No "encoding" required`, and then sets `fEncode` to `false`. - 关闭该元素的开始标记，然后调用方法来关闭``元素。Closes the opening tag of the element, and then calls the method to close the `` element. 此代码示例生成以下标记：This code example generates the following markup: `` `` [!code-cpp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CPP/htmltextwriter.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/CS/htmltextwriter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter/VB/htmltextwriter.vb#5)]
